ruleset.name: jpinpoint-common_std-rules
ruleset.description: jPinpoint rule set for performance aware Java coding, sponsored by Rabobank.

rule.name: AvoidApacheCommonsFileItemNonStreaming
rule.message: Avoid memory intensive FileItem.get and FileItem.getString
rule.description: Problem: Use of FileItem.get and FileItem.getString could exhaust memory since they load the entire file into memory Solution: Use streaming methods and buffering.

rule.name: AvoidConcatInLoop
rule.message: A String is concatenated in a loop. Use StringBuilder.append.
rule.description: A String is built in a loop by concatenation. Problem: Each statement with one or more +-operators creates a hidden temporary StringBuilder, a char[] and a new String object, which all have to be garbage collected. Solution: Use the StringBuilder append method.
